title: Introducing jsluice: A Technical Deep-Dive for JavaScript Gold (Part 2)
summary: Join us for a technical deep-dive of jsluice, an open-source mining tool for JavaScript code and files.

title: Introducing jsluice: The Why Behind JavaScript Gold Mining (Part 1)
